oracle.apps.saf.ta.jaudit.core
Class AbstractSafAuditAddin

java.lang.Object
  oracle.jdeveloper.audit.AuditProvider
      oracle.jdeveloper.audit.AbstractAuditAddin
          oracle.apps.saf.ta.jaudit.core.AbstractSafAuditAddin
All Implemented Interfaces:
oracle.ide.Addin
public abstract class AbstractSafAuditAddin
extends oracle.jdeveloper.audit.AbstractAuditAddin

The base addin for audit extensions that use SAF. Audit providers that use SAF should register an addin in their extension.xml and it should extend from this class. This addin will then register their analyzer's with the audit framework.
In order for this to work the provider must: 1. Create their own AnalyzerRepository implementation. 2. Create their own InjectionModule and bind their AnalyzerRepository implementation.

initialize

public void initialize()
We override the AbstractAuditAddin initialize because we must set the injection module BEFORE the audit's get registered, as we obtain the list of analyzer's through injection.
